content:
One slightly odd thing I just noticed: all the primitives are duplicated under both core and std:

https://doc.rust-lang.org/nightly/core/#primitives
https://doc.rust-lang.org/nightly/std/#primitives

That's intentional. It was changed a couple of months ago. Before, you couldn't link to a primitive from a no_std project and there were other weird quirks with primitives. I'm not sure why the std primitive docs are still around, but there's probably a reason for it.
